description_en:
Prepared on Talh wood for 3 days and enriched with natural brightening herbs & powders.

Why our Dalkah is different?
Traditional Dalkah only cleans the skin â€” no brightening.
But ours is made with imported herbs and brightening powders that go through careful cleaning and drying stages.
Itâ€™s safe for pregnant women, sensitive skin, and completely free from preservatives.

ğŸ”´ Without brightening herbs, Dalkah will never lighten the skin.
Thatâ€™s why we created the first upgraded Dalkah in Kuwaitâ€¦
Results from the first shower.

Benefits:
â€“ Cleans & exfoliates the skin
â€“ Removes dead skin
â€“ Helps with ingrown hair
â€“ Slows hair growth
â€“ Reduces body lines
â€“ Perfect 3 days before laser to pull hidden hair

Usage:
Use twice a week.
Each pack has 10 balls and the amount depends on your body.

Storage:
Keep in the freezer (no preservatives).

description_en:
Formulated with:
Turmeric, frankincense, fruit acids, brightening powders, and vitamins.

This scrub removes dead skin, nourishes the body with active brightening ingredients, reduces excess oils, and helps treat keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) and blackheads.

How to use:
Apply on the body for 10 minutes, then rinse with water.
Use twice a week.

ğŸ”´ Do NOT use the scrub on the same day as the Dalkah.

description_en:
A perfect alternative for girls who donâ€™t know how to use the traditional Dalkah.
These imported herbs help brighten and even the skin tone naturally.

Take an amount that suits your body, mix it with water or yogurt until it becomes firm and starts to dry.
Apply it all over your body and leave it for 5â€“10 minutes so your skin can absorb all the natural ingredients.
Then start scrubbing/rolling, and youâ€™ll see the dead skin coming off â€” leaving your body softer, cleaner, and visibly brighter!

âŒ Not suitable for pregnant women.
